participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and family-oriented, enjoys exploring new hobbies and spending quality time with loved ones.
participant_1.background: I am a tech-savvy ski enthusiast. I listen to blues and jazz. My favorite books are the Harry Potter books. I have never been on a date. I'd rather sleep in, but I do love spending time with my family.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and enthusiastic, values family time and enjoys sharing experiences through music and travel.
participant_2.background: I work 60 hours a week so I can't go to the game, but I'll be cheering from home! I remember singing along to Queens of the Stone Age with my sisters in the car on long road trips. I work hard and save money for my future. I am a financial analyst for a brewery. I own a french bulldog.

content.text: Hey there!
Hey, how's it going?
Pretty good! I'm just watching some Harry Potter with my family.
Oh, I love Harry Potter! I'm more of a fan of the books, though.
I've been meaning to read the books. I've heard they're really good.
They are! They're even better than the movies.
I'm sure they are. I'll have to check them out.
You should!
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go skiing, listen to music, and spend time with my family.
Skiing sounds fun! I've never been before.
You should go! It's a lot of fun.
I might have to try it sometime.
You definitely should!
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to blues and jazz.
Oh, that's cool! I like blues and jazz too.
Awesome! We should listen to some music together sometime.
That would be fun!
Great! I'll bring my record player.
Sounds good
